title: Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons in Silicone Wristbands of Uruguayan Children: Measurement and Exposure Source Exploration

Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) pose health risks to children, potentially resulting in stunted growth, obesity, and cognitive deficits, but lack of reliable and noninvasive means to measure PAHs results in...
